divs: Sighting DetailsWE HAD A POWER OUTAGE LAST NIGHT FOR ABOUT 6 HOURS.I WAS CHECKING FOR LIGHTS AT NEIGHBORS(LOOKING WEST)WHEN A HUGE STARLIKE OBJECT STOOD OUT COMING FROM THE WEST TO EAST,HIGHER THAN I IMAGINED AIRCRAFT TO FLY.NO FLASHING LIGHTS.THE SPEED IS WHAT AWESTRUCK ME.I GO TO THE OPPOSITE SIDE OF HOUSE TO CONTINUE TO WATCH,AND IT JUST VANISHED! WITHIN MINUTES I AM LOOKING OUT THE SAME WINDOW FACING WEST AND A DUPLICATE (STAR)(BALL)(LITE)IS ONCE AGAIN COMING FROM THE WEST TOWARD THE EAST,EXCEPT A FEW MILES APART,(FIRST ONE WAS SOUTHMOST,AND THE SECOND WAS NORTH MOST,BOTH HEADING EAST.AGAIN I FOLLOW THE HUGE LIGHT,AND IT DISAPPEARS RIGHT IN FRONT OF MY EYES! AGAIN,I GUESS THE SPEEDS OF THESE OBJECTS WERE WAY FASTER THAN ANY JET OR ANYTHING.2ND SIGHTING(S) IN A LITTLE OVER 6 MTHS.THANX
